encrypted.title: Encrypted Content
encrypted.description: This content is password protected. A password is required to view it.

delete.title: Delete Scan
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this scan record?

write.title: Write NFC Tag
write.description: Use the button below to write this data to a new NFC tag.

lock.title: Lock Tag
lock.description: Permanently lock the NFC tag to protect its content.
lock.confirmMessage: Do you confirm locking this NFC tag? This action cannot be undone and the tag will no longer be modifiable!

process.title: Process in Progress
process.message: Bring your phone close to the NFC tag...

success.title: Lock Successful
success.message: NFC tag successfully locked. This tag is now read-only and its content cannot be changed.

error.title: Lock Error
error.message: An error occurred while locking the NFC tag

merge.title: Merge Data
merge.description: Add this scan to data merge operation.

modal.title: Encrypted Content
modal.description: This content is password protected. Enter the password to view it.

encryptedContent.title: Encrypted Content
encryptedContent.message: Content is encrypted. You need to decrypt it before sharing.

advancedHistory.title: Advanced History Management
advancedHistory.description: Categorize scans, tag, filter, and more
